featured.text: The speaker was Robot Redford, a robot who delivered the commencement address at a community college in suburban Maryland.
Members can access thousands of listings for apartments, villas, suburban homes and farms around the world.

definition.zh_def: 郊區的，指位於城市邊緣的住宅區。
definition.en_def: Relating to or characteristic of a suburb, which is a residential area on the outskirts of a city.
definition.example: They moved to a suburban neighborhood to enjoy a quieter lifestyle.
